https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mshXTXYy1MltZRh5TljnB2Nayvd.jpg An English nurse and an American soldier on the Italian front during World War I fall in love, but the horrors surrounding them test their romance to the limit. A Farewell to Arms
